They appreciate its stretchiness, with one noting it accommodates a bump well, and love its color, with one mentioning it matched their wedding palette perfectly. While some customers find it perfectly sized, others report sizing inconsistencies. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, soft, beautiful
items.body: The medium fits me well. The only con is the armpits are a bit large and the waist may need a little pull in but itâ€™s just barely off. I think this dress fits pretty well. I think Iâ€™d have preferred a small but I think the small would have been tight on the bottom half and thatâ€™s not what I want. The color is beautiful and the fabric is so soft and the flower pattern is fuzzy to the touch. This dress is totally worth it and I plan to buy more in the future!!! This dress is a soft mesh on the arms and outer layer and a soft polyester spandex blend in the inner layer this dress is modest and flattering and thatâ€™s why I love it. Read more
items.author: Kitten

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loooved this dress for our western work dinner
items.body: The absolute cutest dress! I got probably 10 for a work dinner and I decided on This. Itâ€™s fun and flattering but still professional night. It fit true to size. It was comfortable regular material. The arms are sheer. I liked the bit is just something to note id you are wanting to buy Read more
items.author: Lomax

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable & Perfect for Events!
items.body: I ordered this ZESICA long-sleeve dress and was really impressed! The material is soft, stretchy, and comfortable without feeling cheap. It hugs in all the right places and has a very flattering shapeâ€”especially the sleeves and the fitted waist. The floral texture gives it a classy, elevated look that makes it perfect for dinners, parties, or even holiday events. I ended up returning it only because the fit wasnâ€™t exactly what I needed for the occasion, but the quality itself was great. If you want a dress that looks elegant while still being comfortable to move in, this is definitely a good option! Cons: âœ–ï¸ Fit can vary depending on body type (size up if between sizes) Read more
items.author: Gabrielle Moldovan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zesica just never disappoints!!!
items.body: Once again, Zesica did not disappoint!! My go to brand now for wedding guest attire. I am obsessed just like the others Iâ€™ve purchased in the past. Looks so expensive for the price point. Comfortable and flattering. The rushing makes me feel confident and like I donâ€™t have to suck in! Cannot wait to attend the winter wedding at the end of this month now! True to size and a great length for me at 5â€™3! Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: Classy dress, fits well. It's ruching snatches your waist and does not bring attention to any pooch issues. I did not wear any shaping garments under this. I sized up one because I have hips and rear. It still hugged in the right places and appropriately, i might add. Nice and long. Read more
items.author: DeeA.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: I love this blue floral dress! The print is gorgeous and the blue is even prettier in person. The fit is true to size and very flattering, and the material is breathable without feeling cheap. Itâ€™s easy to dress up with heels or keep casual with sandals. Definitely a great purchase. Read more
items.author: Chloe Ross

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy and cute!
items.body: I got so many compliments on this dress! It fits like an absolute glove and looks more expensive than it is. The color was exactly as shown and it's super stretchy and comfortable. I felt so good in this dress! Read more
items.author: Brianna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it
items.body: Photos don't do this dress justice. Its beautiful. Has quality. Im 155lbs, 5â€™4 and i got a size medium. It comes right to my ankles, which is so flattering with some black heels. Its thick but lightweight. It wont â€œsnatchâ€ your waist. So if you have a belly this might not be the best pick. I Will definitely be getting more! Read more
items.author: samantha t.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Maxi Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Maxi Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, Solid Apricot, Burgundy, Black, Dusty Blue, Solid Coffee, Tie Dye Purple, Red, Floral Black, Tie Dye Brown, Leopard Brown, Navy, Floral Rose. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
